page.title: 04ANNUAL PARISH MEETING 1985
page.content: {Gainford Annual Parish Meeting}was a lively one with most of the 27 members of the public expressing strong views. The residents discussed the possible re-routing of the public bus service along the main road, rather than around the{village green.}It was felt that there would be an increase in the number of accidents if the buses were to stop on the main road. The chairman said that he was annoyed with the state of the bus shelter by the{village green.}It had recently been cleaned and re-painted, but once again it has been misused. He appealed to the youngsters and their parents to take steps and stop this continued damage.
